sig_info: By conjuring a magical barrier, Mordo gains 1066.67 to 6398.37 Energy Resistance while he remains Blocking.

If the opponent strikes Mordo’s Block while they have a True-Type Buff, he has a 60 to 100.01% chance to Nullify that Buff and replace it with a Detonate Buff lasting 20 second(s). Detonate deals a burst of 49.8 Energy Damage when it’s Nullified or Expires.

ASTRAL FORM - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Mordo is Immune to Passive Ability Accuracy reductions.
While the opponent has at least 1 Buff, gain +16.6 Attack Rating.

Every 8 second(s), Mordo gains a Power Gain Buff granting 1 Bar of Power over 5 second(s). This Buff is removed if Mordo is struck. If fighting as a Defender, Mordo will behave less aggressively while this Buff is active.
WHILE STUNNED: Mordo will Evade any incoming Basic Attack and perform a counter-attack which has a 100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff causing 66.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 second(s).
BLOCKING: If Mordo holds Block for more than 0.50 second(s), his Block will not be broken by Unblockable Special Attacks.
WHILE CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Continually gain Fury Buffs, each granting +16.6 Attack Rating for 17 second(s). Max: {3} Buffs. Exponentially gain more Buffs the longer the Heavy Attack is charged.
If Mordo is below 1 Bar of Power, he will Passively gain 0.5 Bar(s) of Power per second.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 30% chance to inflict a 3 second Stun Debuff.
100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff, causing 66.4 Direct Damage over 2.50 second(s). If the opponent has at least 1 Buff, this effect can be triggered through a Block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Soul Barb Debuff lasting 14 seconds, dealing 9.96 Energy Damage per second for each Buff on the opponent. Soul Barb also reduces Regeneration Rate by 80%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain {3} Fury Buffs, each granting +41.5 Attack Rating for 17 second(s).
Up to 50% chance based on lost Health to gain a Regeneration Buff in place of a Fury Buff, recovering 168.15 Health over 6 second(s).
